description:
Colton Haynes, John Stamos and Taylor Lautner walk into a hospital in Scream Queens' second season.《尖叫皇后》第二季，Colton Haynes、John Stamos和Taylor Lautner都将进入医院。

Haynes has officially joined the cast of the Fox horror-comedy. The Arrow star will guest star as a patient at the hospital where the Chanels (Emma Roberts, Billie Lourd and Abigail Breslin) are working, Entertainment Weekly reports. Stamos and Lautner will make their Scream Queens debut as doctors at the hospital.Haynes正式确认将会加入FOX电视台美剧《尖叫皇后》。这位在《绿箭侠》中有不错表现的男演员将会客串该剧，并扮演医院里的病人。Stamos和Lautener将会在《尖叫皇后》中扮演医院医生。

The Ryan Murphy drama will also welcome back Jamie Lee Curtis, Lea Michele, Keke Palmer, Glen Powell and Niecy Nash for its second season.这部Ryan Murphy当制作人的美剧第二季还会迎来Jamie Lee Curtis、Lea Michele、Keke Palmer、Glen Powerll以及Niecy Nash的回归。

Scream Queens returns Tuesday, Sept. 20 at 9/8c on Fox.尖叫皇后将会在9月20日回归Fox电视台。

title: 《尖叫皇后》第二季加入新成员
